channel.title: Web Design on Grady.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Web Design on Grady.dev

item.description: Over christmas break, I got frusturated with my sisterâ€™s incredibly specific asks from a wordpress template, so I built her a website instead. After a brief period of haggling over the acceptable level of bells and whilstles (I wanted more), we came to a resonable design consensus, and I implemented the site and fine tuned it with its owner in about five hours. Scroll down past the menu to see some fun.
